name: Green/Colour Screen Invaders
overview: 2 Versions of the Game, One that looks like your running the Game on a Green Screen Monitor (CBM PET Style), and the Other is your Normal C64 Multi-Colour Mode. Made with help from the Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Using a modified SEUCK Enhancement Framework code with Chaos Attack Wave Mode by me, Original Framework code by Richard Bayliss of TND, Music by Andrew Fisher (Merman)
